channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AL

item.title: Report X-2024021168
item.description:
Report X-2024021168

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-27T18:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-12
  • City: THEODORE
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package found inbound off trailer leakage discovered given to management and hazmat specialist notified DescribePack: leaking from outlet closure on top DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in hazmat tub and hazmat location management notified

item.title: Report X-2024020883
item.description:
Report X-2024020883

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-26T15:11:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-02
  • City: THEODORE
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was found in the unload leaking. Package handlers notified QA and hazmat was removed to the secure hazmat area. DescribePack: Inner caps were loose causing leakage. Box was found wet on one corner. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was removed from the unload area and placed in a hazmat container. It was then stored in the secure hazmat cage.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was found leaking in unload. QA removed package to hazmat secure cage DescribePack: Inner bottles were leaking from cap. Outer packaging was discolored from leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was moved to hazmat cage

item.title: Report X-2024020748
item.description:
Report X-2024020748

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-26T15:11:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-30
  • City: BESSEMER
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was being unloaded when granular leakage was spotted. Package was placed in a bin to contain contents. DescribePack: Vertical crack from bottom to about 3/4 up the pail. Exterior box does not visually show signs of a drop/impact. Head of pail is secure. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Majority of spill was contained by exterior box. The whole package was placed in a sorting bin to contain any further leakage.

item.title: Report X-2024020682
item.description:
Report X-2024020682

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-23T18:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-26
  • City: BIRMINGHAM
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was sat on its side to where the bottles inside started to leak from the tops. DescribePack: The inside of box corroded due to the bottles inside leaking. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was sat up right to prevent more leakage and Isolated.
